profile_circle_info_dialog: You need to join a circle first to perform this operation.
allow_send_notification_tips: Allow sending notifications to others. When enabled, when you send messages, notification events will be sent to XChat push server containing the recipient's pubkey and relay information
allow_receive_notification_tips: Allow receiving message push notifications. When enabled, your device ID will be sent to XChat push server. Disabling will delete your device ID from the push server
notification_setting_failed: Failed to update notification settings. Please check your network connection and try again.
public_key_description: This is your nostr public key. You can share it with your family or friends. Tap to copy!
private_key_description: This is your secret account key. You need this to access your account. Otherwise you won't be able to login in the future if you ever uninstall XChat. Don't share this with anyone! Save it in a password manager and keep it safe!
sign_out_dialog_content: Make sure you've backed up your private key. Otherwise, you risk losing access to your account.
switch_circle_confirm_content: Are you sure you want to switch to this circle?
refresh_profile_from_relay_confirm: This will connect to public relays to fetch your latest profile information. The connection will be temporary and automatically closed after use.
refresh_user_profile_from_relay_confirm: This will connect to public relays to fetch the latest profile information for this user. The connection will be temporary and automatically closed after use.
str_nip96_tips_text: The file server does not support NIP-96
relay_server_description: The relay server is where your messages are stored and forwarded. It acts as a message hub for your circle.
file_server_setting_description: Configure file servers to store and share media files, images, and other attachments in your circle.
delete_circle_confirm_content: This action will permanently delete this circle and cannot be undone. All your data within this circle, including chat messages and other related data, will be irreversibly lost.
qr_generation_failed: QR code generation failed, please try again
one_time_keypackage_confirm_content: Generate a one-time link that can only be used once
permanent_keypackage_confirm_content: Generate a permanent link and publish it to circle relay, can be used multiple times
regenerate_confirm_content: This will generate a new keypackage
discoverable_by_id_description_off: You are private. Only QR/Link works.
discoverable_by_id_description_on: Anyone with your ID can find you.
failed_to_enable_discoverable: Failed to enable discoverable by ID
failed_to_toggle_discoverable: Failed to toggle discoverable by ID
delete_account_confirm_content: This action will permanently delete your account and local data, including messages and media. This cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
show_message_info_option_description: Enable this option to show message information details in the chat interface.
use_tor_network_description: Route all network traffic through the Tor network for enhanced privacy and anonymity. This may slow down your connection.
remove_member_content: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from this circle?
manage_subscription_desc: Manage your subscription details and billing.
cancel_subscription_content: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? Your subscription will remain active until the end of the current billing period.
clear_all_storage_content: Are you sure you want to clear all storage? This action cannot be undone and will permanently delete all stored files and data.
qr_code_share_warning: Only share your QR code and link with people you trust.When shared others will be able to see your username and start a chat with you.
invite_link_description: Anyone who receives this link can initiate a chat with you. Please only share it with people you trust.
